TaxonIdentification.variety_authority: Tang & F. T. Wang ex L. K. Dai

TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 短穗柄薹草 duan sui bing tai cao

treatment.description: Culms 10–28 cm tall. Spikes without peduncle or with very short peduncle.
treatment.distribution: ● Dry places on mountain slopes; ca. 2600 m. Yunnan (Jingdong: Wuliang Shan).
